title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing potatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes in a dream: Seeing potatoes in a dream is interpreted as the marriage of an unmarried girl, fear of the future, and perhaps frying potatoes with great difficulties and fears. Dream scholars may see seeing potatoes as failure, exhaustion, and the inability to achieve dreams, and eating potatoes is one of the things. The most expressive visions of problems and fears in the world. Buying potatoes for men in a dream is evidence of debts and eating them without cooking haste in making decisions and difficulty in bearing life’s responsibilities. In this article you have different interpretations of seeing potatoes in a dream. Potatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing potatoes is interpreted according to what he thinks. By Imam Ibn Sirin about the great dreams and aspirations that the pioneer sought. Eating potatoes in a dream is good, abundant. Eating raw potatoes, cooked potatoes are from permitted sources, inheritance, and the emergence of many happy events. Boiling potatoes in a dream is money and may indicate Many difficult responsibilities that the dreamer will overcome. Rotting potatoes in a dream is bad and bad for the dreamer and it cannot be eaten in this case because it causes illness and extreme fatigue. Interpretation of seeing potatoes for single women: Seeing potatoes in a single girl’s dream means that she is facing some problems and difficulties. Eating potatoes In large quantities in a dream is evidence of a serious psychological and health crisis for this girl. Potatoes in a married woman’s dream. Seeing potatoes in a married woman’s dream is evidence of evil and wickedness, because seeing them in a dream represents negative feelings, fear, and anxiety about the future. Buying potatoes for a married woman is nothing but major financial crises that she is going through. With it and you can go through a financial predicament that you cannot get out of. A married woman cooking potatoes in a dream is a sign of goodness, living and abundant happiness. Storing potatoes may indicate a delay in some decisions that you seek to make in reality and fear of the unknown. Dream scientists also believe that Cooking potatoes in a dream is a source of great nutrition and happiness, and the vision promises the disappearance of stress and anxiety by God’s command. Potatoes in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe expectation of potatoes in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the many difficulties and problems she suffers from during pregnancy. Eating potatoes brings her goodness and happiness. Born with a male child. Storing unhealthy potatoes in a dream, which indicates physical and psychological crises in the family. Shopping and buying potatoes may portend evil. Cooking sweet potatoes for a pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of problems and birth pains that she may feel will go away soon. Details of baked potatoes in a dream Grilling potatoes in a dream is a sign of difficulties and the desire to fulfill distant dreams. The dreamer may experience some Events that disturb his life. Eating baked potatoes is sick, weak and unhealthy, and storing them after baking reflects many problems that will continue for a long time. Peeling potatoes in a dream Washing and peeling potatoes in a dream is no longer a condition and test, God willing. Fried potatoes happiness and stability.

title: Interpretation of the soul’s speech in a dream by Ibn Sirin: good or bad skin?

preview.html: Interpretation of the soul’s conversation in a dream: When a man sleeps and closes his eyes, he begins to enter through the portal of another world, a world full of secrets and mysteries, or a man’s conversation with himself, or through a dream from Satan, and in this article I present to you the Encyclopedia website’s interpretation of the soul’s conversation in a dream. Self-talk is when a person sees One of the situations he went through in his life. Either he sees one of his joys or one of the days in which he achieved great success, or he sees a situation that causes him pain. Because of a difficult experience he went through, such as the betrayal of one of his relatives or the loss of a family member or loved one. Or he experiences failure. He is embarrassed in front of everyone, and at first the person dreams of a stage of sleep. In any brain activity similar to waking activity, the person begins to move quickly during sleep. The eyes also begin to move quickly and the brain emits waves that make the person see the scenes as if they were real. It includes the interpretation of the soul’s speech in Dreaming also states that the subconscious mind plays a major role in this process. The brain receives the memories it sends in the form of waves that the human eye sees during sleep. This entire process, which many see as a complex process, does not affect a person’s sleep and does not make sleep uncomfortable. Due to Because we all dream, most of us do not remember dreams, but the person who remembers self-talk is this person. For him, these memories mean a lot and cause him psychological damage that causes him to enter an endless state of remembering and dreaming. Self-talk is a latent desire within the person to re- Reliving the trauma over and over again. He feels the same emotions he felt when he was exposed to the situation because he is unconsciously still stuck. Either in the feeling of joy or in the feeling of betrayal and distress that was revealed in the situation, and this is where self-talk is created. Signs of self-talk Self in a dream The interpretation of the soul talking in a dream is that you are busy thinking about a specific thing. That is why visions are called dreams, because they are illusions, not reality, not visions from God, and not dreams from Satan. Many people may not realize that there is a big difference between talking to oneself and seeing, although Although...Signs of self-talk in a dream Guide. One of the first signs of self-talk is that it was a vision of a certain situation that the person had been thinking about all day while he was awake. Or a topic that came to his mind before he fell asleep, for example, and he took some time to think about it. If there is a disagreement between you and your manager at work and you are in a state of torment all day over what happened. You may dream that you are in a verbal argument between you and the manager and you see yourself hitting him. Here, the self-talk, because in the dream you realize your latent desires that you cannot achieve in Reality. The second sign: The man or woman sees the things he is most afraid of in reality, which causes him psychological crises. For example, a man may see after a robbery attempt that there is always someone who wants to kill him or chase him during his sleep. A woman who is afraid may dream Very much from her home and children always that the

title: Interpretation of seeing a necklace and a chain in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the necklace for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether wearing, buying, selling, or losing the necklace, a gold necklace, a silver chain, the Imam al-Sadiq necklace, or Ibn Sirin’s necklace. Interpretation of the necklace in a dreamThe necklace can be interpreted in The dream is that it is a responsibility that the dreamer bears in his life, whether in position, marriage, children, or trust. Seeing the necklace breaking in a dream can indicate failure, death, isolation, or divorce, depending on what the necklace symbolizes. Seeing the weight of the necklace in the dream, and the dreamer’s inability to Carrying it, indicates weakness or vulnerability that the dreamer may face. Seeing a necklace in a dream for a woman may indicate the trust that is placed in her, especially if the necklace is made of gold, silver, or diamonds. Seeing a necklace for a pregnant woman may indicate a new male baby. Seeing a necklace for an unmarried girl A married woman may indicate her marriage. The necklace in a man’s dream, if it is made of gold, represents status or prestige and confidence in the management of the matter, and the more luxurious and valuable the chain is, the greater the status. The silver necklace in a man’s dream may indicate his marriage to the first born of a virgin. It may indicate Seeing an iron necklace indicates strength and stability in dealing with matters. Seeing a necklace in a dream, whether it is made of diamonds, gold, or silver, indicates the money that her husband has entrusted to the woman, and this is if the vision is for a woman. As for the man who sees the necklace in his dream, his vision symbolizes Deception, cunning, and the occurrence of mysterious circumstances, and seeing a necklace in a dream symbolizes children and a wife sometimes. Seeing a gold or silver necklace in general in a dream indicates beauty and adornment. As for whoever sees in a dream a necklace made of gold and decorated with pearls, and the dreamer is a man, his vision indicates The status, position, and duties assigned to him in managing the affairs of his people. But if the dream is about a man and he sees that he has a necklace made of gold and decorated with jewels, then the dream indicates the status and money that the dreamer acquires. But if it is of silver, then the vision indicates his marriage to a beautiful woman. And good. But if the necklace is made of iron, then the vision indicates the rule and status that the viewer acquires with strength and stability, and the meaning is the opposite if the vision is a necklace of beads. And for a pregnant wife who sees the necklace in her dream, then her vision indicates the boy she will give birth to, and if the vision is for an unmarried girl. Married, the vision symbolizes marriage. But if anyone, male or female, sees the necklace broken, then the vision indicates that ruler will be removed from his position. As for whoever sees in his dream that he cannot carry a gold or silver necklace because of its weight, then the dream It indicates that he will not complete the work he is doing, and that he will be weakened by it. Interpretation of the necklace around the neck in a dream: Whoever sees on his neck that he has necklaces, rooms, buildings, and the like, or does good, then if he is free, he gets married, carries the barrier, and the pregnant woman will have a child. . If it is a male, then the child is a male, otherwise it is a female. If it is appropriate for the country, then

title: The 10 most famous interpretations of seeing a woman in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing women in black clothes in a dream? Details of a jacket and longevity. Interpretation of seeing blondes in a dream? Content of the dispute. What is the interpretation of seeing a man in a dream of an old woman? It shows the wealth that will be in him. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream as a gynecologist? Indicating that his wife is a woman Good and kind. What is the interpretation of seeing single women in a dream? Evidence of success in her personal and professional life. Interpretation of a woman’s dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing women in black clothes in a dream is a sign of protection and longevity. If one sees women wearing short clothes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has not Not devoted to the teachings of religion. So, seeing a beautiful woman in a dream is a sign of kindness and a year full of love and joy. Seeing a beautiful woman can be a guide to achieving dreams and goals. So, seeing a blonde woman in a dream is a sign of turmoil. Seeing an emaciated woman in a dream It indicates the poverty that the dreamer will suffer from. After that, seeing the unknown woman is evidence of a lot of money that the fortuneteller will obtain in the near future from a lawful source. Interpretation of a dream of a woman for a man If a man sees women in old age in a dream, this indicates the wealth that he will obtain On her. Seeing old women in a dream is evidence of the end of problems and freedom from worries. Then seeing an old woman in a dream is evidence of corruption on earth. A man seeing a gynecologist in a dream is an indication that his wife is a good and virtuous woman. Then seeing a man in a dream, and a woman looking If a man sees in a dream a barren woman who becomes pregnant, this indicates kindness and a good vision. Seeing a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman sees an unmarried girl Married in a dream, this indicates the presence of a girl in her life that will be bad for her. Then, seeing obese women in a dream is evidence of a year full of nutrition and goodness. Seeing thin women in a dream is evidence of a year full of poverty. If a married woman sees in a dream a gynecologist This is a sign of her husband’s love for her. So, seeing a gynecologist in a married woman’s dream is a sign of social intelligence. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant gynecologist in a dream is a sign of easy access and childbirth. So, seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is a worthy vision. Praise for her and she will be happy and cheerful. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman: Seeing a gynecologist in a dream for a single person is evidence of success and the fulfillment of desires. Hence, seeing a woman in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she has reached a prestigious position. Single people in a dream is evidence of success in Their personal and professional lives and obtaining a new job or a prestigious position at work.

title: Interpretation of seeing a snail in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a person eating a snail in a dream: Seeing a person eating a snail in a dream is evidence of sacrifice for the sake of others, and God knows best. Then make a vision of eating a snail in a dream, accepting a position in the field of work that he does not like or accept, but it is a responsibility and obligations. Eating a snail in a dream is a sign of... The presence of problems in life and inconveniences. News and disturbing things all contradict what the viewer sees. But if he ate a snail, its taste was delicious and pleasant, and this is evidence of successful work and the fulfillment of the fortuneteller’s desires. It is also considered evidence of the improvement of the fortuneteller’s material conditions, collecting money and gaining legitimate profit from the work. Interpretation Seeing a snail without a shell in a dream: If a monarch sees a snail without a shell or cover, this is evidence of the revelation of a cover of God’s secret affairs, revealing his affairs and what he was hiding. Where do you see a snail without a shell? For a merchant, it indicates the loss of money, the exposure and accumulation of debts, and perhaps bankruptcy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a snail White in a dreamIn a dream, a white snail indicates good news for a short family, whether it is an engagement or a woman’s pregnancy. Seeing a white snail in a dream, this indicates achieving the goals and aspirations that the viewer seeks. Buying or selling a snail in a dream means buying and selling. In a dream, a snail can arrive To the desires and goals that we strive for. It refers to beautiful things that herald well as well as a bright future. Then it indicates grace, goodness and abundance. Buying and selling snails is evidence of determination to succeed and reach a high goal, and the appearance of some positive changes for the dreamer. Visions also indicate that the dreamer will gain A lot of money or he will inherit it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about snails in many numbers in a dream. Visions in a dream indicate good news and lawful profit in exchange for abundant money. As there is good news for food and many goods. Seeing snails in large numbers in a dream indicates reaching a high and prestigious position. And great and getting a promotion with a large salary. Then the visions make snails in large numbers so that they flourish and pass a happy stage in the dreamer’s life and feel reassured and complete. Seeing a snail in a dream for a married woman. Where do you see a married woman in a dream collecting snails, it indicates her kindness. It indicates gaining a good diet and through it, a lawful profit. Also, when you see her selling snails in a dream, this is evidence of abundant sustenance through it for the husband, and his heart is pleased with it. If a married man sees a snail in a dream, this is evidence that you hear news that makes the heart happy for the family. It may be that she will have good offspring or indicate the fulfillment of her desires. Interpretation of a dream about killing a snail in a dream. Seeing a dream in his sleep when he wakes up. Killing a snail is evidence that you did not do good or bad things in the past. Also, the death of a snail or killing it in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is responsible for his past actions, and God knows best. Also, killing a snail in a dream indicates To be exposed to a bad financial situation and suffer from poverty and need. Then killing a snail in a dream is evidence of

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream?

preview.html: The yellow snake in a dream, the snake is considered a dangerous reptile and seeing it in the dreamer's dream makes him anxious, but it carries within it many suggestions and interpretations such as those that express goodness, paint, strength, and others that bring the owner nothing but sadness, anxiety and bad luck, and we will list all the details related to this topic in the following article. The yellow snake in a dream Interpretation scholars have explained many meanings and symbols that explain the meaning of the yellow snake in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees the yellow snake in his dream, this is a clear indication that he will suffer from a serious health problem that makes him bedridden and prevents him from performing sad and anxious daily activities and tasks. If one sees the yellow snake in a dream, this is clear evidence of the presence of a malicious and deceitful person who pretends to love him and has strong enmity and plans to give him a strong stab in the back that kills him. Always, so he must be careful. If the dreamer is working and sees the yellow snake in his dream, this is a clear indication of the many problems and crises he is exposed to in his workplace because of his colleagues who hate him. The yellow snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many meanings and associations associated with seeing a yellow snake in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees a yellow snake in his dream, this is clear evidence that he is going through a difficult period of financial stumbling, distress, lack of financial resources, and accumulation of debts, which leads to psychological pressures controlling him. If a man gets married and sees a yellow snake in his bed in a dream, this is clear evidence that his partner is corrupt in his character and commits major sins and that there is another man in her life. The interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake in the bed of a married man symbolizes that one of his children will be exposed to an insurmountable disaster. What is the interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a single woman has many interpretations and symbols, the most important of which are the following: If an unmarried woman is engaged and sees a yellow snake in her dream, she will separate from her partner due to incompatibility and many problems between them. If a girl sees a yellow snake in her dream, this is a sign of her bad luck on the emotional level, which makes her miserable and unhappy. From the point of view of the great scholar Al-Nabulsi, if an unmarried woman sees a yellow snake in her dream, this is clear evidence of the corruption of her life, her distance from God, and the abundance of her sins. She has to hurry to repent and return to God so that her end will not be bad. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake in a vision for a girl who is still studying means her inability to pass exams and failure, which makes her feel disappointed and hopeless. The yellow snake in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman in a dream of a yellow snake in a dream leads to many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer gets married and sees the yellow snake in her dream, she will be stabbed in the back by her closest companions, which will make her feel betrayed and sad. If she sees the husband

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about chicken by Ibn Sirin and leading interpreters?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about chicken: A person is interested in the world of dream interpretation in the hope that some visions will be evidence of his coming happiness and relieve him of stress and sorrows. When he sees a chicken in a dream, the dreamer becomes confused about the meaning of this and begins to search for the interpretation of this vision, and is it good news for him or not? In this topic, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of a chicken for an unmarried and married woman next to a pregnant woman, with the exception of some indicators related to it. Dream interpretations Chicken What is the interpretation of a dream about a chicken? Some interpreters believe that seeing chickens is one of the good things for a person because most dreams interpreted from this point of view are good and the person tolerates the dreamer. For example, eating chicken meat in a dream indicates that there is a great livelihood waiting for the individual. As for buying chicken in a dream It is a sign of great blessings and luck in a person’s life, and the more chickens he buys, the more he earns. Chicken is one of the most promising visions for a single woman, because its presence in her dream, well-cooked, is evidence of her marriage to a handsome man who will make her happy and treat her well, and seeing a married woman is evidence of that. . Life with the husband will be happy and full of goodness. It is possible to interpret the vision of chicken with some bad things, especially the vision of raw chicken, in addition to the fact that chicken can be a symbol that the girl is beautiful and beautiful, but she is characterized by lack of thought and narrow mind. As for eating the head of a chicken in a dream, it is one of the visions. It is unpleasant for its owner because it warns him of a loss he will suffer in his life, and this loss will be a woman very close to him. Like his wife or mother. Eating certain parts of the chicken's body has different interpretations. For example, if the dreamer sees that he is eating chicken feet, this is a big warning to him that he is on the wrong path and must stay away from it from the beginning. What is the interpretation of a dream about chicken by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of a dream about chicken has many different meanings according to what he saw A person. However, if a person eats this chicken while roasting or grilling it, this is explained by the expansion of the person’s livelihood, which will come in the form of money, but this person must first make a great effort to obtain the return. Seeing a chicken in a dream with some chicks explains to the dreamer That a great loss awaits him and therefore he must be careful and keep his money well, especially since the loss is related to material aspects. If a person sees that there are chickens walking in front of him, this means that he thinks a lot about obtaining money, but through halal, there is no similarity with the person In this vision and the fortuneteller's attempt to catch up with it. Chicken in his dream is evidence of the great effort he puts into this livelihood. As for buying chicken, Ibn Sirin says that it has more than one interpretation. If the chicken is white, it indicates the marriage of the person if he is single, but if it turns black, this indicates the dreamer’s greed for women. The one who will get married. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about one chicken is considered one of the enjoyable things for an unmarried girl.

If the chicken is white, it indicates the marriage of the person if he is single, but if it turns black, this indicates the dreamer’s greed for the woman he will marry. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google. title: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a cake in a dream means marriage to a divorced person or a single widower. If you disobey God Almighty, harm means returning to the path of truth and accepting repentance. If you are a man who owns a company and supports a family, this indicates blessing in your work. Sweets It means that the ruler will remain In his position without being removed from his duties. If this sweetness is fried in oil, it means good and beneficial cooperation with others. If the cake tastes good, your worries disappear, as if they had never happened. Eating sugar in a dream is an escape from death and recovery From illness. Cake for a man who has trade is a lawful livelihood. Interpretation of cake in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing cake in a dream for a single woman is a clear indication of the good that will happen to you in a dream with partners. These projects are successful and partners with good morals will not betray them or cause problems, and if The girl was suffering from problems with her family because of marriage, so these problems will end. The cake in the dream belongs to an unmarried woman and she was standing at the door of a store to buy it, which means that she is trying hard to achieve something and that she will make an effort beyond her capabilities. But what she seeks will not be achieved and she will lose a lot. Of only time and effort, if she is making a cake in a dream, then this is a girl who is good to people and has intense love for those around her. Interpretation of a dream about cake for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about cake for a married woman means the kind words spoken about her in her absence. Eating cake means new relationships and friendships that change her life for the better. To see cake, means success in life or business. To see pieces of cake spread everywhere, it means wonderful relationships that will immerse you in your next life, perhaps in a new job. Interpretation of cake in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees that she is eating cake or sees the cake in her house The dream is a safety message for this woman, as she may have had a miscarriage in the previous period and is afraid that the fetus will miscarry. Because the cake is made on birthdays and weddings, this means that her fetus is in good health, and that she will give birth to the fetus in good condition, and will not be exposed to financial hardship. In a way In general, the interpretation of seeing a cake means psychological safety and means good people, because the occasions in which the cake is made are pleasant occasions in which we feel together. Interpretation of a dream about a cake gift: A girl who sees someone giving her a cake is a sign of marrying a young man who shows him good morals. Married / married women who receive a sour gift in The dream indicates pregnancy. The gift of a cake in all circumstances indicates hearing happy news, joy, and medical relationships. The feeling of joy of the dreamer who received the gift of a cake in the dream indicates the resolution of disputes and success at work. The gift of a cake in a dream. Giving a cake to another person in a dream represents the best of their circumstances and walking on the path of truth. A vision that gives sourness indicates Burning an unknown person to get rid of him indicates the dreamer’s ability to get rid of problems with good behavior. If the dreamer sees himself offering a cake to someone close to him, this indicates how much he loves him. The gift of a cake expresses the owner of the

title: I dreamed that a woman told me that you are pregnant with a boy

preview.html: Seeing a pregnant woman with her in a dream is evidence that she will give birth to a son of God Almighty, and the dream is interpreted for a married woman that she will find comfort in her life and end all problems, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a woman telling me that you are pregnant with a boy in a dream for a single girl. If she is unmarried and thinking about having children after marriage and she sees a woman telling her that she is pregnant with a boy. It shows that she is thinking a lot about having children after marriage and that she thinks a lot about it. And seeing single women in a dream means that a woman is telling her That you are pregnant with a boy in the past few months. It indicates that she will be saved from major problems that she faced in her life and sadness. If an unmarried woman sees that a stranger is telling her that she is pregnant with a boy in a dream. It explains that she will live with good things in her life and will live in an abundance of goodness. Also A single woman sees an unknown woman telling her that she is pregnant with a boy in a dream and she is happy. It indicates that he will take care of all good things, God willing, and will live in them, and God knows best. And a married woman tells a single girl that she is pregnant in a dream and in her first days. This indicates that she will live in goodness and good things, God willing. In her life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about the birth of a beautiful girl for pregnant women, married women, and single women. Interpretation of seeing a woman telling me that you are pregnant with a boy in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that a woman tells her that you are pregnant with a boy and she is happy. It indicates the good things that this married woman will see in her life. God willing. While a married woman sees in a dream that she is pregnant with a boy in the first months of her pregnancy. The meaning indicates the abundance of goodness and food that she sees and she will live, God willing. And the knowledge of a married woman in a dream is that the woman tells her that you are pregnant with a boy in a dream. This is clear evidence of reputation. The goodness that distinguishes this married woman in her life. If a married woman sees that she is pregnant with a boy in a dream and she is very happy with him. It is a sign of joy in her home that she will be happy with and will live in for a long time, God willing. A married woman whose relative told her that she is pregnant with a boy in a dream and is about to give birth. A clear indication that the difficult things in her life will end in this period of time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a woman telling me that you are pregnant with a boy in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that a woman tells her that you are pregnant with a boy in a dream and she is happy. This indicates the good and good things that she will experience and nurture. In her life. Also, if a divorced woman looks at a woman in a dream, it tells her that you are pregnant in the dream. It explains that during this period she will end some major crises in her life. Knowing that the divorced woman is pregnant in the first months of pregnancy in the dream and she is happy. And here She explains that she will marry a good and righteous man, and he will make her happy in her life, God willing. Also knowing that the stranger knows the divorced woman that she is pregnant with a boy, and is about to give birth. He explains that there is someone who will propose to her now, and she agrees to marry him, and God knows best. What if the divorced woman looks at The stranger told her that she was pregnant in a dream. Here the meaning indicates that she will approach this unknown with a goal
